tool_description: Minecraft bot control with hybrid context model: minimal background awareness + critical alerts + detailed state on demand

available_commands.description: Get complete detailed game state (health, position, all entities with coordinates, all visible blocks, complete inventory)
Get detailed inventory breakdown with item counts and durability
Get list of nearby blocks with coordinates (default: 10m radius)
Gather specified resource (wood, stone, ores, etc.)
Move in a direction (forward, back, left, right)

tool_usage_guidance: HYBRID CONTEXT MODEL - You receive game awareness in three ways:
1. BACKGROUND SUMMARIES (automatic, every 10s):
- One-line status: HP, Food, Position, Threat count, Time
- Example: '[Minecraft] HP: 15/20 | Food: 10/20 | Pos: (123,64,456) | Threats: 2 | Time: Night'
- Low overhead, maintains basic awareness
2. CRITICAL ALERTS (automatic, immediate):
- Health drops below 8 HP (critical danger)
- Health drops 5+ points suddenly (under attack)
- New hostile mob within 5 meters
- Food at 0 (starving)
- Valuable resources discovered (diamond/emerald ore)
- These provide detailed context with coordinates when urgent
3. DETAILED PULLS (on your explicit request):
- Use minecraft.get_full_status for complete game state
- Use minecraft.get_inventory for detailed item breakdown
- Use minecraft.get_nearby_blocks for block coordinates
- Only call these when you need precise information for planning
WHEN TO USE DETAILED PULLS:
- Planning navigation: get_full_status for entity/block coordinates
- Resource management: get_inventory to check what you have
- Building/crafting: get_nearby_blocks to find materials
- Combat strategy: get_full_status for enemy positions and threat levels
RESPONSE STRATEGY:
- Background summaries keep you aware passively
- Critical alerts demand immediate response (flee, fight, eat)
- Use detailed pulls before complex actions (navigation, building)
- Don't spam detailed pulls - trust the background summaries for routine awareness
proactive_triggers: - Only pull details when you need to act on them

metadata.notes: Hybrid model: minimal background (~100 chars/10s) + critical alerts (immediate) + detailed pulls (explicit). Scales to any game.
